SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
App class is the main class of the application.
Category
Category is an entity that has an id, name and a reference to site
CategoryManager
CategoryManager class for managing categories in the database.
Controller
Controller class for the main view of the application that displays the list of sites in a table, search for sites, and add, modify, and delete sites.
DocController
Document Controller to manage documents associated to a site
DocPopupController
DocPopupController class is used to display a document in a popup window.
Document
Document is an entity that represents a file associated with a site.
DocumentManager
DocumentManager class provides methods for managing documents in the database.
EditController
 
LoadPopUp
LoadPopUp class that loads the popup view and returns the controller
Manager
Manager class to manage database connections.
PopupController
PopupController class is used to display a popup window.
Site
Site is an entity that represents a construction site.
SiteController
 
SiteManager
SiteManager class that manages the retrieval of sites from the database.
Subcategory
Subcategory is an entity that represents a subcategory of a category.
SubcategoryManager
SubcategoryManager class that provides methods for managing subcategories in the database.
Task
Task is an entity that represents a task of a subcategory.
TaskManager
TaskManager class that manages tasks in the database.
